page.title: 09HOUSING FOR THE ELDERLY 2.
page.content: The Quarry Hills Home used to be the { {workhouse}in Victorian times. A new building is at present under construction. In Thornborough Gardens there is a block of {sheltered accommodation} where people who are not able to do everything for themselves are housed. A warden is in residence. Each of the 21 flats is self-contained and there is a communal lounge where residents can meet together to chat.Two of the residents of these flats are over 90 years old. As will be seen there is ample provision made for the elderly people of the area to be housed.
